tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_items (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   barcode VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   stock_level INT DEFAULT 0,
   last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryItems (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  barcode VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  quantity INT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE StockRecords (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inventory_item_id INT,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  quantity_change INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (inventory_item_id) REFERENCES InventoryItems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE StockRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT REFERENCES InventoryItems(id),
  update_date TIMESTAMP,
  quantity_changed INT,
  updated_by_user VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_items (
  item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  barcode VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  item_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE stock_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id UUID REFERENCES inventory_items(item_id),
  transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  quantity_changed INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Scan_Events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scan_id INT REFERENCES Barcode_Scans(scan_id),
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT,
  event_time TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
